Camera Translation

Function Key
Move Camera Upwards W
Move Camera Downwards S
Move Camera Left A
Move Camera Right D

Camera Rotation

Function Key
Rotate Room Counter-Clockwise Left Arrow
Rotate Room Clockwise Right Arrow
Pitch Camera Up Up Arrow
Pitch Camera Down Down Arrow

Miscellaneous

Function Key
Zoom In Q
Zoom Out E
Rotate Selected Object Scrollwheel
Remove Selected Object Backspace
